title: Dirty Sixer tease 36er All-Road Mark II bike for the tallest riders (up to 7′ 6″)
content:
Dirty Sixer is updating their 36″ wheel All-Road commuter bike for extra tall people through to extra, extra, extra, extra, extra tall people. Now Mark II, the 36er will shortly be available in sizes XL-5XL with a whopping pre-order discount of $2000 USD. Past customers of the Dirty Sixer All-Road include LeBron James, Mark Eaton,

The post Dirty Sixer tease 36er All-Road Mark II bike for the tallest riders (up to 7′ 6″) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
